creator: Matific (Slate Science)
descriptionHtml:
Matific is an award-winning math program that has proven to help improve students math test scores by 34%. Matific is designed by world-class early-age math education experts, and is based on vast experience with math teaching and research. It is focussed on teaching children core math skills in a fun, educational and interactive way.

Covering full-year curriculum, Matific develops mathematical excellence and problem-solving skills through playful interaction. Endorsed by elementary school teachers and principals around the world, Matific is the product of choice for developing early-age math excellence and scientific intuition. Matific’s activities are curriculum aligned and promote self-discovery. There are hundreds of adaptive and intuitive math activities that focus on core math skills covering full-year curriculum.

Your child will encounter the following core math skills and topics while learning through Matific:
* Algebra
* Addition and Subtraction
* Comparison
* Counting
* Data analysis
* Decimal operations
* Decimals
* Fractions
* Geometry
* Length and Area
* Measurement
* Multiplication and division
* Mixed operations
* Money
* Patterns
* Percentages
* Problem solving
* Reading and writing digits
* Time
* 2D Shapes and so much more!

Features include:
* Full coverage for grades K to 6
* Activities designed to develop core math skills
* Promotes self-discovery
* Inbuilt support to assist students learning
* Curriculum aligned
* Rewards children with a fun, interactive and motivating game rewards
* Teaches math in a progressive, spiral learning system

Matific is the perfect educational experience, combining fun and learning. So join your child on an extraordinary adventure that will delight and leave them more excited about mathematics than you ever thought possible!

“This kind of program, which gives students opportunities to explore and experiment with specific math ideas, is rare and much more valuable to my students than a tutorial or skills practice website. Lessons with Matific build number sense and mathematical reasoning far better than standard textbook lessons.” Cathy F. California

“Matific is exciting, top-quality, and refreshing. So many apps do to education what industrial agriculture did to food: making it efficient, dull, and low-quality. Matific really stands out from all the rest.” John D, United Kingdom

Privacy Policy: https://www.matific.com/home/privacy/
Terms Of Use: https://www.matific.com/home/terms/

creator: Matific - Educational Maths Games
descriptionHtml:
Maths game for kids aged 4-12, years K-6.

Make maths learning fun with Matific – the multi-award-winning kids educational maths game designed by leading education experts.

*ENDORSED BY TEACHERS AROUND THE WORLD

Matific introduces and develops core maths and problem-solving skills in a fun and interactive way which your child will love.

Set on Matific’s magical adventure islands, our app’s adaptive game play lets kids explore new worlds, unlock hidden levels, navigate challenges and collect treasure, all while learning maths!

Are you ready to set your child up for maths success?

Download now and start your free 7-day trial.

*PERSONALISED LEARNING PATHWAYS FOR YOUR CHILD

Our adaptive algorithm automatically adjusts to your child’s level of maths understanding and unique learning style, so they can master concepts at their own pace without any maths anxiety.

*PROVEN TO BOOST MATHS OUTCOMES BY 34%

In just 30 minutes a week, Matific helps improve test scores by an average of 34% by developing conceptual maths understanding and critical thinking.

*SCHOOL CURRICULUM ALIGNED

Matific is fully aligned with the Australian and New Zealand primary school maths curriculum and covers all the core maths skills required from years K to 6 (ages 4-12).

*DESIGNED BY EDUCATION EXPERTS

Matific is designed by world-class mathematics education experts from Harvard, Berkeley, MIT, and Stanford and is backed by cutting edge education research and teaching methods.

*GAMIFIED WORLD OF ADVENTURE WITH REWARDS KIDS LOVE

Matific is a magical experience, filled with helpful characters and exciting challenges. Each student customizes their own avatar to explore Matific’s adventure islands and as they achieve maths mastery, new areas of the islands unlock, treasure is collected and new avatar options appear! Say goodbye to boring maths checklists and tasks!

*CORE MATHS SKILLS COVERED

Matific’s maths learning activities are specifically designed to develop the foundation building blocks of mathematics:
* Algebra
* Addition and Subtraction
* Comparison
* Counting
* Data analysis
* Decimal operations
* Decimals
* Fractions
* Geometry
* Length and Area
* Measurement
* Multiplication and division including times tables
* Mixed operations
* Money
* Patterns
* Percentages
* Problem-solving
* Reading and writing digits
* Time
* 2D Shapes and so much more!

Plus, Matific includes helpful hints and clues, audio prompts for younger students not yet reading, and inbuilt how-to animations to assist with maths mastery.

*IN-DEPTH REPORTING FOR PARENTS

Quickly gain insights and track your child’s maths progress in real-time, both on the app and online. Plus, we send regular updates straight to your inbox so that you’re always up-to-date.

*TRY RISK FREE FOR 7 DAYS

Matific is the perfect educational experience, combining fun and learning.

Start your free 7-day trial today and start an extraordinary adventure that will delight your child and get them more excited about mathematics than you ever thought possible.

WHAT PARENTS AND TEACHERS ARE SAYING ABOUT MATIFIC

“This kind of program, which gives students opportunities to explore and experiment with specific maths ideas, is rare and much more valuable to my students than a tutorial or skills practice website. Lessons with Matific build number sense and mathematical reasoning far better than standard textbook lessons.” Cathy F, California

“Matific is exciting, top-quality, and refreshing. So many apps do to education what industrial agriculture did to food: making it efficient, dull, and low-quality. Matific really stands out from all the rest.” John D, United Kingdom

“The ideal companion to abc kids games” Jarrah R, New Zealand

PRIVACY AND SAFETY

Matific is kidSAFE certified. There is no advertising and no third party can contact your child through the app. You can access our Privacy policy here https://www.matific.com/home/privacy/ or contact us at support@matific.com.au for more information.

Make maths learning fun with Matific – the multi-award-winning kids educational maths game designed by leading education experts.

*ENDORSED BY TEACHERS AROUND THE WORLD
Matific introduces and develops core maths and problem-solving skills in a fun and interactive way which your child will love.
Set on Matific’s magical adventure islands, our app’s adaptive game play lets kids explore new worlds, unlock hidden levels, navigate challenges and collect treasure, all while learning maths!
Are you ready to set your child up for maths success?
Download now and start your free 7-day trial.

*PERSONALISED LEARNING PATHWAYS FOR YOUR CHILD
Our adaptive algorithm automatically adjusts to your child’s level of maths understanding and unique learning style, so they can master concepts at their own pace without any maths anxiety.

*PROVEN TO BOOST maths OUTCOMES BY 34%
In just 30 minutes a week, Matific helps improve test scores by an average of 34% by developing conceptual maths understanding and critical thinking.

*SCHOOL CURRICULUM ALIGNED
Matific is fully aligned with the Australian, New Zealand, UK, India and over 40 countries primary school maths curriculum and covers all the core maths skills required from years K to 6 (ages 4-12)

*DESIGNED BY EDUCATION EXPERTS
Matific is designed by world-class mathematics education experts from Harvard, Berkeley, MIT, and Stanford and is backed by cutting edge education research and teaching methods.

*GAMIFIED WORLD OF ADVENTURE WITH REWARDS KIDS LOVE
Matific is a magical experience, filled with helpful characters and exciting challenges. Each student customises their own avatar to explore Matific’s adventure islands and as they achieve maths mastery, new areas of the islands unlock, treasure is collected and new avatar options appear! Say goodbye to boring maths checklists and tasks!
*CORE maths SKILLS COVERED
Matific’s maths kids learning game activities are specifically designed to develop the foundation building blocks of mathematics:
* Algebra
* Addition and Subtraction
* Comparison
* Counting
* Data analysis
* Decimal operations
* Decimals
* Fractions
* Geometry
* Length and Area
* Measurement
* Multiplication and division including times tables
* Mixed operations
* Money
* Patterns
* Percentages
* Problem-solving
* Reading and writing digits
* Time
* 2D Shapes and so much more!

Plus, Matific includes helpful hints and clues, audio prompts for younger students not yet reading, and inbuilt how-to animations to assist with maths mastery.

*IN-DEPTH REPORTING FOR PARENTS
Quickly gain insights and track your child’s maths progress in real-time, both on the app and online. Plus, we send regular updates straight to your inbox so that you’re always up-to-date.

*TRY RISK FREE FOR 7 DAYS
Matific is the perfect kids educational game experience, combining fun and learning.
Start your free 7-day trial today and start an extraordinary adventure that will delight your child and get them more excited about mathematics than you ever thought possible.

WHAT PARENTS AND TEACHERS ARE SAYING ABOUT MATIFIC
“This kind of program, which gives students opportunities to explore and experiment with specific maths ideas, is rare and much more valuable to my students than a tutorial or skills practice website.” Cathy F, California

“Matific is exciting, top-quality, and refreshing. So many apps do to education what industrial agriculture did to food: making it efficient, dull, and low-quality. Matific really stands out from all the rest.” John D, United Kingdom


PRIVACY AND SAFETY
Matific is kidSAFE certified. There is no advertising and no third party can contact your child through the app. You can access our Privacy policy here https://www.matific.com/home/privacy/ or contact us at support@matific.com.au for more information.
descriptionShort: Award-winning maths game for kids 4-12. Make learning maths fun & rewarding!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
We update the Matific app as often as possible to make it faster and more reliable for you. These improvements ensure that you continue to have an awesome experience while using Matific.
In this update:
- Connect with fellow explorers and celebrate their achievements.
- Stay in the loop with important notifications.
- Enjoy an enhanced Training Zone experience.
- Experience even faster performance and improved stability.
- Benefit from various bug fixes and optimizations.

Matific introduces and develops core maths and problem-solving skills in a fun and interactive way which your child will love.
Set on Matific’s magical adventure islands, our app’s adaptive game play lets kids explore new worlds, unlock hidden levels, navigate challenges and collect treasure, all while learning maths!
Are you ready to set your child up for maths success?
Download now and start your free 7-day trial.

*PERSONALISED LEARNING PATHWAYS FOR YOUR CHILD
Our adaptive algorithm automatically adjusts to your child’s level of maths understanding and unique learning style, so they can master concepts at their own pace without any maths anxiety.

*PROVEN TO BOOST maths OUTCOMES BY 34%
In just 30 minutes a week, Matific helps improve test scores by an average of 34% by developing conceptual maths understanding and critical thinking.

*SCHOOL CURRICULUM ALIGNED
Matific is fully aligned with the Australian, New Zealand, UK, India and over 40 countries primary school maths curriculum and covers all the core maths skills required from years K to 6 (ages 4-12)

*DESIGNED BY EDUCATION EXPERTS
Matific is designed by world-class mathematics education experts from Harvard, Berkeley, MIT, and Stanford and is backed by cutting edge education research and teaching methods.

*GAMIFIED WORLD OF ADVENTURE WITH REWARDS KIDS LOVE
Matific is a magical experience, filled with helpful characters and exciting challenges. Each student customises their own avatar to explore Matific’s adventure islands and as they achieve maths mastery, new areas of the islands unlock, treasure is collected and new avatar options appear! Say goodbye to boring maths checklists and tasks!
*CORE maths SKILLS COVERED
Matific’s maths kids learning game activities are specifically designed to develop the foundation building blocks of mathematics:
* Algebra
* Addition and Subtraction
* Comparison
* Counting
* Data analysis
* Decimal operations
* Decimals
* Fractions
* Geometry
* Length and Area
* Measurement
* Multiplication and division including times tables
* Mixed operations
* Money
* Patterns
* Percentages
* Problem-solving
* Reading and writing digits
* Time
* 2D Shapes and so much more!

Plus, Matific includes helpful hints and clues, audio prompts for younger students not yet reading, and inbuilt how-to animations to assist with maths mastery.

*IN-DEPTH REPORTING FOR PARENTS
Quickly gain insights and track your child’s maths progress in real-time, both on the app and online. Plus, we send regular updates straight to your inbox so that you’re always up-to-date.

*TRY RISK FREE FOR 7 DAYS
Matific is the perfect kids educational game experience, combining fun and learning.
Start your free 7-day trial today and start an extraordinary adventure that will delight your child and get them more excited about mathematics than you ever thought possible.

WHAT PARENTS AND TEACHERS ARE SAYING ABOUT MATIFIC
“This kind of program, which gives students opportunities to explore and experiment with specific maths ideas, is rare and much more valuable to my students than a tutorial or skills practice website.” Cathy F, California

“Matific is exciting, top-quality, and refreshing. So many apps do to education what industrial agriculture did to food: making it efficient, dull, and low-quality. Matific really stands out from all the rest.” John D, United Kingdom


PRIVACY AND SAFETY
Matific is kidSAFE certified. There is no advertising and no third party can contact your child through the app. You can access our Privacy policy here https://www.matific.com/home/privacy/ or contact us at support@matific.com.au for more information.

descriptionHtml:
Maths game for kids aged 4-12, years K-6.

Make maths learning fun with Matific – the multi-award-winning kids educational maths game designed by leading education experts.

*ENDORSED BY TEACHERS AROUND THE WORLD
Matific introduces and develops core maths and problem-solving skills in a fun and interactive way which your child will love.
Set on Matific’s magical adventure islands, our app’s adaptive game play lets kids explore new worlds, unlock hidden levels, navigate challenges and collect treasure, all while learning maths!
Are you ready to set your child up for maths success?
Download now and start your free 7-day trial.

*PERSONALISED LEARNING PATHWAYS FOR YOUR CHILD
Our adaptive algorithm automatically adjusts to your child’s level of maths understanding and unique learning style, so they can master concepts at their own pace without any maths anxiety.

*PROVEN TO BOOST maths OUTCOMES BY 34%
In just 30 minutes a week, Matific helps improve test scores by an average of 34% by developing conceptual maths understanding and critical thinking.

*SCHOOL CURRICULUM ALIGNED
Matific is fully aligned with the Australian, New Zealand, UK, India and over 40 countries primary school maths curriculum and covers all the core maths skills required from years K to 6 (ages 4-12)

*DESIGNED BY EDUCATION EXPERTS
Matific is designed by world-class mathematics education experts from Harvard, Berkeley, MIT, and Stanford and is backed by cutting edge education research and teaching methods.

*GAMIFIED WORLD OF ADVENTURE WITH REWARDS KIDS LOVE
Matific is a magical experience, filled with helpful characters and exciting challenges. Each student customises their own avatar to explore Matific’s adventure islands and as they achieve maths mastery, new areas of the islands unlock, treasure is collected and new avatar options appear! Say goodbye to boring maths checklists and tasks!
*CORE maths SKILLS COVERED
Matific’s maths kids learning game activities are specifically designed to develop the foundation building blocks of mathematics:
* Algebra
* Addition and Subtraction
* Comparison
* Counting
* Data analysis
* Decimal operations
* Decimals
* Fractions
* Geometry
* Length and Area
* Measurement
* Multiplication and division including times tables
* Mixed operations
* Money
* Patterns
* Percentages
* Problem-solving
* Reading and writing digits
* Time
* 2D Shapes and so much more!

Plus, Matific includes helpful hints and clues, audio prompts for younger students not yet reading, and inbuilt how-to animations to assist with maths mastery.

*IN-DEPTH REPORTING FOR PARENTS
Quickly gain insights and track your child’s maths progress in real-time, both on the app and online. Plus, we send regular updates straight to your inbox so that you’re always up-to-date.

*TRY RISK FREE FOR 7 DAYS
Matific is the perfect kids educational game experience, combining fun and learning.
Start your free 7-day trial today and start an extraordinary adventure that will delight your child and get them more excited about mathematics than you ever thought possible.

WHAT PARENTS AND TEACHERS ARE SAYING ABOUT MATIFIC
